"anything i can do?...sitting around is a bit unmondo...." Suukie asked as
he came out of the CR Chamber.....he stared at his reflection in the shiny
wall of the Maximal base..... "hey! stop staring at me! go away or i'll
shoot ya and you will not be free!...." Suukie said to his reflection..he
aimed his gun at his reflection, ready to fire........staring........
